verses.verse: וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> become בִּימֵ֣י <WH3117> Now it came to pass in the days אֲחַשְׁוֵר֑וֹשׁ <WH325> of Ahasuerus ה֣וּא <WH1931> he אֲחַשְׁוֵר֗וֹשׁ <WH325> (this [is] Ahasuerus הַמֹּלֵךְ֙ <WH4427> which reigned מֵהֹ֣דּוּ <WH1912> from India וְעַד־ <WH5704> unto כּ֔וּשׁ <WH3568> even unto Ethiopia שֶׁ֛בַע <WH7651> and seven וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twenty וּמֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> [over] an hundred מְדִינָֽה׃ <WH4082> provinces

בַּיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> [That] in those days הָהֵ֑ם <WH1992> those כְּשֶׁ֣בֶת ׀ <WH7675> place הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> when the king אֲחַשְׁוֵר֗וֹשׁ <WH325> Ahasuerus עַ֚ל <WH5921> on כִּסֵּ֣א <WH3678> on the throne מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <WH4438> of his kingdom אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בְּשׁוּשַׁ֥ן <WH7800> which [was] in Shushan הַבִּירָֽה׃ <WH1002> the palace

בִּשְׁנַ֤ת <WH8141> year שָׁלוֹשׁ֙ <WH7969> In the third לְמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> of his reign עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> he made מִשְׁתֶּ֔ה <WH4960> a feast לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all שָׂרָ֖יו <WH8269> unto all his princes וַעֲבָדָ֑יו <WH5650> and his servants חֵ֣יל ׀ <WH2426> army פָּרַ֣ס <WH6539> of Persia וּמָדַ֗י <WH4074> and Media הַֽפַּרְתְּמִ֛ים <WH6579> the nobles וְשָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> and princes הַמְּדִינ֖וֹת <WH4082> of the provinces לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> [being] before

בְּהַרְאֹת֗וֹ <WH7200> When he shewed אֶת־ <WH853> עֹ֙שֶׁר֙ <WH6239> the riches כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> of his glorious מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <WH4438> kingdom וְאֶ֨ת־ <WH853> יְקָ֔ר <WH3366> and the honour תִּפְאֶ֖רֶת <WH8597> of his excellent גְּדוּלָּת֑וֹ <WH1420> majesty יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> days רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> many שְׁמוֹנִ֥ים <WH8084> and fourscore וּמְאַ֖ת <WH3967> [even] an hundred יֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> days

וּבִמְל֣וֹאת ׀ <WH4390> were expired הַיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> And when these days הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> these עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> made הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <WH4428> the king לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> unto all the people הַנִּמְצְאִים֩ <WH4672> that were present בְּשׁוּשַׁ֨ן <WH7800> in Shushan הַבִּירָ֜ה <WH1002> the palace לְמִגָּ֧דוֹל <WH1419> both unto great וְעַד־ <WH5704> against קָטָ֛ן <WH6996> and small מִשְׁתֶּ֖ה <WH4960> a feast שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days בַּחֲצַ֕ר <WH2691> in the court גִּנַּ֥ת <WH1594> of the garden בִּיתַ֖ן <WH1055> palace הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of the king's

ח֣וּר ׀ <WH2353> [Where were] white כַּרְפַּ֣ס <WH3768> green וּתְכֵ֗לֶת <WH8504> and blue אָחוּז֙ <WH270> [hangings] fastened בְּחַבְלֵי־ <WH2256> with cords ב֣וּץ <WH948> of fine linen וְאַרְגָּמָ֔ן <WH713> and purple עַל־ <WH5921> and גְּלִ֥ילֵי <WH1550> rings כֶ֖סֶף <WH3701> to silver וְעַמּ֣וּדֵי <WH5982> and pillars שֵׁ֑שׁ <WH8336> of marble מִטּ֣וֹת ׀ <WH4296> the beds זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> [were of] gold וָכֶ֗סֶף <WH3701> and silver עַ֛ל <WH5921> on רִֽצְפַ֥ת <WH7531> upon a pavement בַּהַט־ <WH923> of red וָשֵׁ֖שׁ <WH8336> marble וְדַ֥ר <WH1858> and white וְסֹחָֽרֶת׃ <WH5508> and black

וְהַשְׁקוֹת֙ <WH8248> And they gave [them] drink בִּכְלֵ֣י <WH3627> in vessels זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> of gold וְכֵלִ֖ים <WH3627> (the vessels מִכֵּלִ֣ים <WH3627> vessels שׁוֹנִ֑ים <WH8138> being diverse וְיֵ֥ין <WH3196> wine מַלְכ֛וּת <WH4438> and the royal רָ֖ב <WH7227> in abundance כְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> according to the state הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of the king

וְהַשְּׁתִיָּ֥ה <WH8360> And the drinking כַדָּ֖ת <WH1881> [was] according to the law אֵ֣ין <WH369> there אֹנֵ֑ס <WH597> none did compel כִּי־ <WH3588> for כֵ֣ן ׀ <WH3651> so יִסַּ֣ד <WH3245> had appointed הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> for so the king עַ֚ל <WH5921> unto כָּל־ <WH3605> each רַ֣ב <WH7227> to all the officers בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> of his house לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> that they should do כִּרְצ֥וֹן <WH7522> pleasure אִישׁ־ <WH376> according to every man's וָאִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> person

גַּ֚ם <WH1571> also וַשְׁתִּ֣י <WH2060> Also Vashti הַמַּלְכָּ֔ה <WH4436> the queen עָשְׂתָ֖ה <WH6213> made מִשְׁתֵּ֣ה <WH4960> a feast נָשִׁ֑ים <WH802> for the women בֵּ֚ית <WH1004> house הַמַּלְכ֔וּת <WH4438> [in] the royal אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which לַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> which [belonged] to king אֲחַשְׁוֵרֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH325> Ahasuerus ס

בַּיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> On the seventh כְּט֥וֹב <WH2896> was merry לֵב־ <WH3820> when the heart הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king בַּיָּ֑יִן <WH3196> with wine אָמַ֡ר <WH559> he commanded לִ֠מְהוּמָן <WH4104> Mehuman בִּזְּתָ֨א <WH968> Biztha חַרְבוֹנָ֜א <WH2726> Harbona בִּגְתָ֤א <WH903> Bigtha וַאֲבַגְתָא֙ <WH5> and Abagtha זֵתַ֣ר <WH2242> Zethar וְכַרְכַּ֔ס <WH3752> and Carcas שִׁבְעַת֙ <WH7651> the seven הַסָּ֣רִיסִ֔ים <WH5631> chamberlains הַמְשָׁ֣רְתִ֔ים <WH8334> that served אֶת־ <WH854> in פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> in the presence הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אֲחַשְׁוֵרֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH325> of Ahasuerus

לְ֠הָבִיא <WH935> To bring אֶת־ <WH853> וַשְׁתִּ֧י <WH2060> Vashti הַמַּלְכָּ֛ה <WH4436> the queen לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בְּכֶ֣תֶר <WH3804> with the crown מַלְכ֑וּת <WH4438> royal לְהַרְא֨וֹת <WH7200> to shew הָֽעַמִּ֤ים <WH5971> the people וְהַשָּׂרִים֙ <WH8269> and the princes אֶת־ <WH853> יָפְיָ֔הּ <WH3308> her beauty כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for טוֹבַ֥ת <WH2896> for she [was] fair מַרְאֶ֖ה <WH4758> to look on הִֽיא׃ <WH1931> he

וַתְּמָאֵ֞ן <WH3985> refused הַמַּלְכָּ֣ה <WH4436> But the queen וַשְׁתִּ֗י <WH2060> Vashti לָבוֹא֙ <WH935> to come בִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> commandment הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> at the king's אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> by הַסָּרִיסִ֑ים <WH5631> [his] chamberlains וַיִּקְצֹ֤ף <WH7107> wroth הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> therefore was the king מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> very וַחֲמָת֖וֹ <WH2534> and his anger בָּעֲרָ֥ה <WH1197> burned בֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king לַחֲכָמִ֖ים <WH2450> to the wise men יֹדְעֵ֣י <WH3045> which knew הָֽעִתִּ֑ים <WH6256> the times כִּי־ <WH3588> for כֵן֙ <WH3651> so דְּבַ֣ר <WH1697> manner הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> (for so [was] the king's לִפְנֵ֕י <WH6440> toward כָּל־ <WH3605> all יֹדְעֵ֖י <WH3045> all that knew דָּ֥ת <WH1881> law וָדִֽין׃ <WH1779> and judgment

וְהַקָּרֹ֣ב <WH7138> And the next אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him כַּרְשְׁנָ֤א <WH3771> unto him [was] Carshena שֵׁתָר֙ <WH8369> Shethar אַדְמָ֣תָא <WH133> Admatha תַרְשִׁ֔ישׁ <WH8659> Tarshish מֶ֥רֶס <WH4825> Meres מַרְסְנָ֖א <WH4826> Marsena מְמוּכָ֑ן <WH4462> [and] Memucan שִׁבְעַ֞ת <WH7651> the seven שָׂרֵ֣י ׀ <WH8269> princes פָּרַ֣ס <WH6539> of Persia וּמָדַ֗י <WH4074> and Media רֹאֵי֙ <WH7200> which saw פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> face הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king's הַיֹּשְׁבִ֥ים <WH3427> [and] which sat רִאשֹׁנָ֖ה <WH7223> the first בַּמַּלְכֽוּת׃ <WH4438> the kingdom

כְּדָת֙ <WH1881> according to law מַֽה־ <WH4100> what לַּעֲשׂ֔וֹת <WH6213> What shall we do בַּמַּלְכָּ֖ה <WH4436> unto the queen וַשְׁתִּ֑י <WH2060> Vashti עַ֣ל ׀ <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not עָשְׂתָ֗ה <WH6213> because she hath not performed אֶֽת־ <WH853> מַאֲמַר֙ <WH3982> the commandment הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king אֲחַשְׁוֵר֔וֹשׁ <WH325> Ahasuerus בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> by הַסָּרִיסִֽים׃ <WH5631> chamberlain ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> answered [מוּמְכָן כ] (מְמוּכָ֗ן <WH4462> Memucan ק) לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> before הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king וְהַשָּׂרִ֔ים <WH8269> and the princes לֹ֤א <WH3808> not עַל־ <WH5921> and הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> to the king לְבַדּ֔וֹ <WH905> only עָוְתָ֖ה <WH5753> hath not done wrong וַשְׁתִּ֣י <WH2060> Vashti הַמַּלְכָּ֑ה <WH4436> the queen כִּ֤י <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> but all הַשָּׂרִים֙ <WH8269> only but also to all the princes וְעַל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> and to all the people אֲשֶׁ֕ר <WH834> who בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all מְדִינ֖וֹת <WH4082> that [are] in all the provinces הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king אֲחַשְׁוֵרֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH325> Ahasuerus

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יֵצֵ֤א <WH3318> shall come abroad דְבַר־ <WH1697> For [this] deed הַמַּלְכָּה֙ <WH4436> of the queen עַל־ <WH5921> unto כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַנָּשִׁ֔ים <WH802> unto all women לְהַבְז֥וֹת <WH959> so that they shall despise בַּעְלֵיהֶ֖ן <WH1167> their husbands בְּעֵינֵיהֶ֑ן <WH5869> in their eyes בְּאָמְרָ֗ם <WH559> when it shall be reported הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> The king אֲחַשְׁוֵר֡וֹשׁ <WH325> Ahasuerus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> commanded לְהָבִ֨יא <WH935> to be brought in אֶת־ <WH853> וַשְׁתִּ֧י <WH2060> Vashti הַמַּלְכָּ֛ה <WH4436> the queen לְפָנָ֖יו <WH6440> before וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not בָֽאָה׃ <WH935> him but she came

וְֽהַיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> this day הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> This תֹּאמַ֣רְנָה ׀ <WH559> say שָׂר֣וֹת <WH8282> [Likewise] shall the ladies פָּֽרַס־ <WH6539> of Persia וּמָדַ֗י <WH4074> and Media אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> which have heard אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבַ֣ר <WH1697> of the deed הַמַּלְכָּ֔ה <WH4436> of the queen לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> princes הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> unto all the king's וּכְדַ֖י <WH1767> Thus [shall there arise] too much בִּזָּי֥וֹן <WH963> contempt וָקָֽצֶף׃ <WH7110> and wrath

אִם־ <WH518> If עַל־ <WH5921> and הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king ט֗וֹב <WH2895> If it please יֵצֵ֤א <WH3318> let there go דְבַר־ <WH1697> commandment מַלְכוּת֙ <WH4438> a royal מִלְּפָנָ֔יו <WH6440> from him וְיִכָּתֵ֛ב <WH3789> and let it be written בְּדָתֵ֥י <WH1881> among the laws פָֽרַס־ <WH6539> of the Persians וּמָדַ֖י <WH4074> and the Medes וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יַעֲב֑וֹר <WH5674> that it be not altered אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> may no תָב֜וֹא <WH935> come וַשְׁתִּ֗י <WH2060> That Vashti לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> no more before הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king אֲחַשְׁוֵר֔וֹשׁ <WH325> Ahasuerus וּמַלְכוּתָהּ֙ <WH4438> her royal estate יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> give הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> and let the king לִרְעוּתָ֖הּ <WH7468> unto another הַטּוֹבָ֥ה <WH2896> that is better מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <WH4480> is more

וְנִשְׁמַע֩ <WH8085> shall be published פִּתְגָ֨ם <WH6599> decree הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> And when the king's אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> which יַעֲשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> which he shall make בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <WH4438> throughout all his empire כִּ֥י <WH3588> for רַבָּ֖ה <WH7227> great הִ֑יא <WH1931> he וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הַנָּשִׁ֗ים <WH802> women יִתְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> shall give יְקָר֙ <WH3366> honour לְבַעְלֵיהֶ֔ן <WH1167> to their husbands לְמִגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> both to great וְעַד־ <WH5704> against קָטָֽן׃ <WH6996> and small

וַיִּיטַב֙ <WH3190> be accepted הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> And the saying בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> affliction הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וְהַשָּׂרִ֑ים <WH8269> and the princes וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> did הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king כִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> according to the word מְמוּכָֽן׃ <WH4462> of Memucan

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> For he sent סְפָרִים֙ <WH5612> letters אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all מְדִינ֣וֹת <WH4082> provinces הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> into all the king's אֶל־ <WH413> to מְדִינָ֤ה <WH4082> into every province וּמְדִינָה֙ <WH4082> province כִּכְתָבָ֔הּ <WH3791> according to the writing וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to עַ֥ם <WH5971> thereof and to every people וָעָ֖ם <WH5971> of every people כִּלְשׁוֹנ֑וֹ <WH3956> after their language לִהְי֤וֹת <WH1961> become כָּל־ <WH3605> every אִישׁ֙ <WH376> that every man שֹׂרֵ֣ר <WH8323> should bear rule בְּבֵית֔וֹ <WH1004> in his own house וּמְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> and that [it] should be published כִּלְשׁ֥וֹן <WH3956> according to the language עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> people פ
